name: Swordster
description:
Swordster,

Game made by a group of 3 for a school project.

The game is about a swordster diving into a dungeon.

His only weapon is a special sword and as a swordster he uses the recall of the sword to kill his enemies.

Use WASD to move around and the mouse to throw the sword in any direction.

Once it is thrown, you can recall the sword and it comes back to you immediatly, everything between you and the sword will be killed.

Hope you have fun with this small prototype.
